title: Pixel 3: What to do from Fastboot mode without resetting to factory settings?
content:
When I turned on my Pixel 3 today, the Google logo on a white screen just flashes on and off.

I went into Fastboot mode, then Recovery mode, then No command screen, then Reboot system now and again the result is the Google logo on a white screen just flashing on and off.

Is there a solution anyone knows of that doesn't mean me resetting to factory settings?

Thanks in advance!
